tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE citizenship_requirements (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    residency_duration INT,
    language_proficiency VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE requirements (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    residency_duration INT,
    language_proficiency VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE citizenship_status (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE applicant (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    requirement_id INT REFERENCES requirements(id),
    status_id INT REFERENCES citizenship_status(id)
)

CREATE TABLE CitizenshipApplications (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    applicant_name VARCHAR(100),
    residency_id INT,
    language_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (residency_id) REFERENCES ResidencyDuration(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (language_id) REFERENCES LanguageProficiency(id)
);
